original_text: The entrance room of this gate opened towards the outside yard. There were pictures of palm trees on the walls of the passage. Eight steps went up to this gate.
korean_text: 현관이 바깥뜰로 향하였고 그 문 벽 위에도 종려나무를 새겼으며 그 문간으로 올라가는 여덟 층계가 있더라

sentences.original_text: The entrance room of this gate opened towards the outside yard.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 문의 입구 방은 바깥뜰을 향해 열려 있었다.

sentences.original_text: There were pictures of palm trees on the walls of the passage.
Eight steps went up to this gate.
